title: Zen & Zuri Personalized Monogram Initial Disc Gold Filled Necklace, Gift for Her, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Anniversary, Bridesmaid Proposal Box
features: Personalize this necklace with the monogram of your choice. Click the "Customize Now" button to enter your personalization details. Its delicate, dainty nature makes the perfect gift for Mother's Day, bridesmaids, birthday, baby shower, anniversary, Christmas and all other special occasions!
Chain Length: 16” with 2” chain extender. Avoid contact with sea water, perfumes, cosmetic products, and cleaning supplies.
Quick Turnaround: Orders ship within 2 business days! Handmade in the USA.
Disc Size: ½” in diameter. Material: 14k gold filled, anti-tarnish material (will not turn blue or green and will not stain skin)
Jewelry Gift Box + soft polishing cloth included. Copyright Zen and Zuri
description: Our timeless gold-filled monogram necklaces serve as the perfect keepsake and gift for her. These elegant personalized initial necklaces make the cutest gifts for Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, birthdays and Christmas. Handmade with love, each piece is made with the utmost attention and engraved with care in our studio in Southern California!
